Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Central
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to a track condition.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to a track condition near the area of Hamlin.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service from Howard to Dempster-Skokie in both directions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

#97 Skokie buses.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
